mapper.select: SELECT member.num, member.name, member.rank, rank.rankname FROM member JOIN dept ON member.dept = dept.deptno JOIN rank ON member.rank = rank.rankno WHERE member.dept = #{dept} ORDER BY member.rank ASC

SELECT member.name, rank.rankname, dept.deptname FROM member JOIN dept ON member.dept = dept.deptno JOIN rank ON member.rank = rank.rankno WHERE member.dept = #{dept} AND member.rank = #{rank} AND member.name = #{name} ORDER BY member.rank ASC
